des:
This skill for DIY people, who created their own smart home based on "Home Assistant" (https://www.home-assistant.io/).
You can now use Alexa to control lights, switches and thermostats with the comfort of voice.
This skill requires the "Home Assistant" solution.
Currently, the support includes lights, switches, plugs, outlets and thermostats.

To use this skill you need to provide the Home Assistant server address and token which can be created in user settings.

If you have trouble installing, you can contact us at tin@hs2t.com, or the articles at https://hs2t.com
